application

Class ProductionRecord

  • java.lang.Object
    • application.ProductionRecord

  • class ProductionRecord
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that represents a Production Record. Objects of this class get created whenever the "Record Production" button is pressed.
    Author:
    Joshua Colicchio

        Constructor used when creating a new ProductionRecord.

        quantity - How many products were produced in this run.
        product - What product was produced.

      • ProductionRecord

        public ProductionRecord(int quantity,
                        java.lang.String serialNum,
                        long dateProduced,
                        Product prodRef)
        Constructor used when loading a ProductionRecord from the database.
        Parameters:
        quantity - How many products of this type were produced.
        serialNum - The serial number associated with this ProductionRecord
        dateProduced - The date when this ProductionRecord was created.
        prodRef - The product that was created.
